full_text:
Re: MCC Visit Thursday
From
To
Date 2019/08/15 08:54
Subject: Re: MCC Visit Thursday
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Sorry about the abrupt prior email. I was hoping to get the names so we could ensure we have enough vests for everyone.
>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) "USANYS" [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 8/14/2019 10:56 PM >>>
I just found out that additional law enforcement agents will be joining but I don't know how many and who. I asked. I'm sorry!
On Aug 14, 2019, at 12:49 PM, [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov> wrote:
<!--[if mso 9]> <!--<![endif]-->
Resending, I got an error last time.
From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 12:41 PM
To: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>; [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Principal Deputy Attorney General
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Advisor at AG's office
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - US Attorney
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Deputy US Attorney
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Chief of the Criminal Division, SDNY
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Counsel to the US Attorney
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Chief, Public Corruption Unit, SDNY
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Chief, Public Corruption Unit, SDNY
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - AUSA
From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 12:26 PM
To: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>; [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday
Hi [b(6); (b)(7)(C)
Not a problem. I will add them to the list. Do you have everyone's titles?
I will advise the Warden of the request that he accompany us on the tour.
Thank you,
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Page 17203
DOJ-OGR-00026340

Re: MCC Visit Thursday
From

Date 2019/08/15 08:54
Subject: Re: MCC Visit Thursday
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Sorry about the abrupt prior email. I was hoping to get the names so we could ensure we have enough vests for everyone.

>>> [b(6); (b)(7)(C) "USANYS" [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov> 8/14/2019 10:56 PM >>>
I just found out that additional law enforcement agents will be joining but I don't know how many and who. I asked. I'm sorry!

<!--[if mso 9]> <!--<![endif]-->
Resending, I got an error last time.

From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 12:41 PM
To: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>; [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday

[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Principal Deputy Attorney General
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Advisor at AG's office
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - US Attorney
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Deputy US Attorney
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Chief of the Criminal Division, SDNY
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Counsel to the US Attorney
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Chief, Public Corruption Unit, SDNY
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - Chief, Public Corruption Unit, SDNY
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) - AUSA

From: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2019 12:26 PM
To: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>; [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS)
[b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Cc: [b(6); (b)(7)(C) (USANYS) [b(6); (b)(7)(C) @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: RE: MCC Visit Thursday

Hi [b(6); (b)(7)(C)
Not a problem. I will add them to the list. Do you have everyone's titles?
I will advise the Warden of the request that he accompany us on the tour.
Thank you,
[b(6); (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content appears to be related to a visit to a correctional facility and the coordination of law enforcement presence.
